thread.title: WATCH LIVE: President Trump, Japanese PM Shinzo Abe Give Joint Statement on North Korea
thread.title_full: WATCH LIVE: President Trump, Japanese PM Shinzo Abe Give Joint Statement on North Korea

author: Mediaite TV
title: WATCH LIVE: President Trump, Japanese PM Shinzo Abe Give Joint Statement on North Korea
text:
WATCH LIVE: President Trump, Japanese PM Shinzo Abe Give Joint Statement on North Korea by Mediaite TV | 10:32 pm, February 11th, 2017 
President Trump and Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe will meet with the press at Mar-A-Lago tonight, where it is believed that they will address tonightâ€™s news that North Korea has conducted a new ballistic missile test. 
The presser is scheduled for 10:30 P.M. EST. 
Watch above, via The White House. 
[Image via Screengrab]
